subject: France
description_text: Hello, I'm trying to order your PLUS X P3-H3 pedalboard from Amazon, but they seem to be blocking the order. I can only order through Amazon because I have gift vouchers that I need to use.

conversations.body_text: Hi Aureltouch orl, You can try buying the P2-H2 first, then buying the clutch separately.
I can't find the clutch on Amazon.
